title: Scottish Seas
description: Follow the fears and triumphs of Mac Ayton, a young Scottish farm boy in 1707, striving to grow strong amid clashes with the sea, banditry, myths, animals, and brothers. Set in and around the colorful fishing village of Auchmithie-located on the rugged east coast of Scotland-Mac and the rest of his family live a life full of laughter, faith, and wrestling.
author: Douglas M. Jones III
